duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead daily construction of residential homes
Assure construction safety, quality, and specification compliance
Supervise daily construction efforts to ensure project is constructed in accordance with design, codes, budget, and schedule requirements
Provide technical assistance, construction document interpretation, and recommendation of construction methods and equipment as required
Assist construction management in developing and implementing the project schedule

education_certification.credential: 5 years + working in the residential construction industry
Experience with Poured Wall Crew with a residential foundation
